subheader-title-1: Focus on the work that matters
subheader-title-2: Dropbox is the world’s first smart workspace. We bring all your team’s content together while letting you use the tools you love. And we help cut through the clutter, surfacing what matters most.
beigemidsection-title-2: Most “productivity” tools get in your way and constantly disrupt your flow. There’s a more enlightened way to work. Dropbox helps people be organized, stay focused, and get in sync with their teams.
bluemidsection-title-1: File storage and sharing are just the beginning
bluemidsection-title-3: Bring traditional files, cloud content, Dropbox Paper docs, and web shortcuts together in one place—and work the way that works for you.
bluemidsection-title-5: Personalized suggestions give you files and folders when you need them so you spend less time searching.
bluemidsection-title-7: Coordinate with your team and push projects forward with the tools you use every day—all within Dropbox.
bluemidsection-footer-title-1: Learn more about the benefits of Dropbox
subfooter-title-1: Find the right Dropbox plan for you
subfooter-title-3: For businesses and teams of any size
